examples: Getting a visa isn't as simple as you might suppose.
Obtener una visa no es tan simple como podría suponer.
Prices will go up, I suppose.
I don't suppose for a minute that he'll agree (= I'm sure that he won't).
No supongo ni por un minuto que estará de acuerdo (= estoy seguro de que no lo hará).
It's reasonable to suppose that he left the note after he tried to call her.
Es razonable suponer que dejó la nota después de intentar llamarla.
